description.en:
“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”

A terrible virus has appeared in Seoul! On the same day Lee Yeongwoo and his classmates are traveling there. They are trapped in the tense atmosphere of Seoul, with the virus in the form of bubbles like frog eggs!
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

altTitles.ja: 華山拳魔

description.en:
Dam-Ho, the sole survivor of a raid on his village, has a lame leg, the worst possible condition for a martial artist. Nonetheless, he refuses to stop training. Whilst everyone around him tells him he cannot become a martial artist, Dam-Ho refuses to give up on his dream. Will he really be able to become the best martial artist?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AqS6Z96-Wn8)
- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%94%EC%82%B0%EA%B6%8C%EB%A7%88/2469)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12113)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/75613)
description.ja: 一寸先は闇の戦乱時代 村が襲われ、唯一生き残った胆虎（たんこ）。 だが胆虎は片足が不自由で武人としては致命的だった。 不屈の精神を持つ胆虎は周りから何を言われようと諦めずに修練を続けた… 己の拳ひとつで天下を貫いた華山の魔人、これは彼が伝説になるまでの物語。
description.ko: 자신의 마을이 습격받고 유일하게 살아남은 담호, 하지만 담호는 절름발이다. 무인으로서 최악의 조건이지만 담호는 수련을 멈추지 않는다. 주변 사람들로부터 무인이 될 수 없다고 듣지만 끝까지 포기하지 않는 담호, 과연 그는 최고의 무인이 될 수 있을 것인가?
description.ru: После ужасного налета на деревню Дам Хо оказывается единственным выжившим. К сожалению, это событие не прошло без вреда для мальчика. С поврежденной ногой теперь у него нет шансов овладеть каким-либо боевым искусством. Тем не менее это не останавливало его, и он продолжал свои тренировки. Под давлением окружающих, слушая язвительные насмешки, Дан Хо продолжает идти к своей мечте. И кто знает, к чему его это приведет?
description.zh: 不知何时开始，中原魔教四起！在武林即将被魔教颠覆之际。 各路武林正道联手诛灭魔神，终结了动荡的武林.... 因为这场浩劫，天经成为了一个孤儿，并且在腿上留下了残疾 所幸被华山派所救，残疾的天经成为了华山派的一员.... 不被看好被歧视的天经要如何凭借更多的努力和不屈的意志，成为整个武林的至尊强者呢！

description.en:
Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?

In lands far..far away, where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists, where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid, rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes

story & art by me & my wife, together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read

After dropping out of school, Kwon Daegun is preparing for his qualification exam. While working a part-time job in a convenience store he got into a fight with some thugs. Daegun, who easily overpowered them, is offered a project called “Iljin in Charge/The Bully In Charge” by the Educational Foundation, which has been closely watching him for a long time. He, who accepted the offer after much consideration, enters a high school that belongs to the foundation and defeats the core bullies of this school one by one according to the order of the foundation.

altTitles.ja: 義妹生活

description.en:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.

Zegar is a hero who avoids problems at all costs. The only thing he fears are demonic swords, evil weapons that try to possess their wielders. But for some reason, they don't stop chasing him and sticking to him.

Zegar just wanted to live a quiet life, doing small missions and staying out of trouble. But, unintentionally, he becomes the center of several events that shake the fantastic continent.

“Ah… Damn.”

He regrets it, but it's too late. If he can't run away, he only has one option: cut his enemies with demonic swords!

altTitles.ja: BUNGO―ブンゴ―

description.en: In a town with no baseball team, young Bungo spends his days throwing the ball he received as a gift against a wall until Yukio Noda, Japanese representative youth baseball player, appears before him and an unexpected showdown ensues! After a chance meeting in middle school, these two enroll in Seio Senior where they struggle to make it to Koshien with everything they have.
description.pt-br: Em uma cidade sem time de beisebol, o jovem Bungo passa seus dias jogando a bola que recebeu como presente contra uma parede até que Yukio Noda, o jogador de beisebol jovem representante japonês, aparece diante dele e um confronto inesperado acontece! Depois de um encontro casual no ensino médio, esses dois se matriculam no Seio Senior, onde lutam para chegar a Koshien com tudo o que têm.

title.en: Douse Suterareru no nara, Saigo ni Suki ni Sasete Itadakimasu

altTitles.ja: どうせ捨てられるのなら、最後に好きにさせていただきます

altTitles.en: With a Strong-Willed Marchioness, Prince Yandere's Love Offensive
Before You Discard Me, I Shall Have My Way With You

altTitles.es-la: Si de todos modos vas a dejarme, haré que me ames hasta el final

description.en: Agnès has been engaged in an arranged, political engagement with Lucile since childhood and fell in love with him upon meeting him. Lucile however does not return these feelings and sees the marriage as purely political. Now adults, Lucile wishes to break off engagements and marry the one he truly loves, Agnès however will not go down so easily.
description.ja: 侯爵令嬢アニエスは、長年の片恋の相手であり婚約者である王太子・リュシリュールに婚約破棄を告げられる。彼の隣には恋敵の姿が。どうせ愛されることはないのであれば、捨てられ虐げられることしかないのであれば、だったら最後に……。家を、そして自らの自由と矜持を守るために取ったあるとんでもない行動で、しかし何故かアニエスはリュシリュールに執着されてしまう。意地っ張りで素直になれない二人の、縺れに縺れた恋の行方は……――？気が強い侯爵令嬢×拗らせヤンデレ王太子、意地っ張りな二人のすれ違いラブロマンス。

title.en: A Manga World That Gets One Page Once a Year

altTitles.ja-ro: 1-Nen de 1 pēji dake susumu manga no sekai

altTitles.ja: １年で１ページだけ進むマンガの世界

altTitles.pt-br: O mundo de um mangá que recebe uma página por ano

altTitles.es-la: El mundo de un manga que avanza una página por año

description.en: **At least it's consistent!**
Sequel to Blood Rain (Min)

**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

altTitles.ja: ベルリンは鐘

description.en: A chaotic 4-panel manga about the daily lives of siblings Ringabelle and Bigbell, who are bells.

title.en: Sherbet Above the Sea of Fog

description.en:
Sherbet, a girl from a noble family, is forced to marry a man she has never met. She decides to escape this fate and joins a cruise that sails through the sea of mist, a place full of legends and secrets.

There, she meets several interesting characters, such as a pirate captain, a runaway princess, a curious mermaid and a cruel empress. She also discovers that the cruise is actually a ghost ship that takes the souls of the dead to the next world.

She will have to face various dangers and challenges to escape the ship and find her true love.

Jinwoo Kim had been slaving as an assistant writer for 6 years with nothing to show for it. He quits his workplace. Later, he abruptly has a notification pop up and now he has scenes popping into his head and system prompts telling him he must be at a location to write. Maybe this is how he will become a star writer??
description.ko:
어느 날 갑자기 생긴 글 쓰는 능력,
보조작가로 구르던 나 김진우에게도 스타작가의 길이 열렸다! 가즈아~~!
.
.
[시스템 : 제한 시간 내에 랜덤 배정된 장소에서만 글쓰기 능력이 실현됩니다^^!
장소 : 한라산/제한 시간 : 20시간]
"...네?"(김진우/서울시)

altTitles.ja: コーセルテルの竜術士~子竜物語~

altTitles.zh: 魔法龙术士~子龙物语~魔法龙术士第三部~

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔法龍術士~子龍物語~魔法龍術士第三部~

description.en:
The adventures of Marciel and his dragons continues. In Koryuu Monogatari, the baby dragons have grown up a little.

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%B3%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BB%E3%83%AB%E3%83%86%E3%83%AB%E3%81%AE%E7%AB%9C%E8%A1%93%E5%A3%AB)

title.en: The Saga of Tanya the Evil

altTitles.de: Die Militärischen Aufzeichnungen eines kleinen Mädchens

altTitles.th: บันทึกสงคราม ของยัยเผด็จการ

altTitles.ja: 幼女戦記

altTitles.es: Crónicas de una niña en guerra

altTitles.it: La saga di Tanya la malvagia
Le cronache militari di una ragazzina

altTitles.pt: Crônicas Militares de uma Pequena Garota

altTitles.en: The Military Chronicles of a Little Girl

altTitles.es-la: La Saga de Tanya la Malvada

description.en:
A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army.

Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.  

Adapted from Light Novel of same name.  

---

**Note:** Manga and Light Novel Licensed in English by Yen Press as "The Saga of Tanya the Evil".
description.es-la: Una joven chica que lucha en el frente de una guerra. Tiene el pelo rubio, ojos azules y una piel blanca, casi transparente, y es conocida por moverse como el viento en el campo de batalla. Ella es Tanya Degurechaff y se encarga de dirigir al ejército. Solía ser un asalariado de élite en Japón, pero debido a la ira de un dios, renació como una niña pequeña. Tanya lo da todo por avanzar en su carrera militar y se convertirá en la maga más poderosa del ejército imperial.

title.en: A Manga about a Beautiful Girl

altTitles.ja: 美少女まんが描きました

description.en: A series of short comics by Mattaku Moosuke (@mmousuke on Twitter) about the cutest girl in class, Inuta-san, and the boy sitting next to her, Inukai-kun.

The daily experiences of modern monster girls.   
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.
A salaryman summons Astaroth, a Prince of Hell, to help him stop getting bullied at work.

Kim SooHyun is an ordinary high schooler who isn’t good at studying, fighting, or being attractive. Suddenly, he’s faced with a quest window right in front of his eyes. After being given the powers of a game [system] out of nowhere, how will our hero confront the challenges ahead of him?
description.ko:
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학], [인생존망]과 세계관을 공유하는 박태준 유니버스 스핀오프 작품!
공부, 싸움, 외모.
뭐 하나 잘난 것 없는 평범한 고등학생 ‘김수현’의 눈앞에 갑자기 퀘스트창이 나타났다!
첫 번째 퀘스트, [엄마한테 사과하기]를 완료한 수현은 보상으로 키가 3cm 커지게 되는데!
퀘스트 엄청 쉽잖아?! 어떤 퀘스트든 완료해주마! 그런데 다음 퀘스트가?
[system] 학교 일진녀와 키스하십시오.
description.ru:
[Действие происходит в той же вселенной, что и «Лукизм» и «Как бороться (вирусный хит)»]

Ким Сухён – обычный старшеклассник. Он не очень хорош в учебе, борьбе и совсем не привлекателен. Внезапно прямо перед ним возникает окно квестов. Получив возможности игровой [Системы] из ниоткуда, как наш герой будет противостоять стоящим перед ним вызовам?

description.en:
Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
description.pt: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?
description.pt-br: Em uma sociedade onde aparência significa tudo, Park Hyumg Suk, pequeno, gordo e não atraente, sofre bullying diariamente, mas nunca falou a sua mãe super trabalhadeira sobre isso. Um dia, quando sua mãe o vê sofrendo bullying, ela o envia para uma escola melhor. Mas infelizmente, ele descobre que sua nova escola é tão cruel quanto a anterior. Uma noite, ele acorda e descobre que de repente ficou alto, forte e incrivelmente bonito. Quando volta para a cama e encontra o seu corpo antigo corpo dormindo. Ele agora tem uma mente e dois corpos. Toda vez que um dorme, o outro corpo acorda, e toda vez que um acorda o outro dorme. Com medo de sofrer bullying novamente na nova escola, ele decide usar o seu novo corpo para ir à escola. Mas como será isso? Será que ele finalmente será aceito?

altTitles.ja: ワイルドアダプター

description.en: Makoto Kubota wandered through life, not taking things too seriously or looking too deep within himself. His job as the head of the Izumo Group's youth gang kept him pleasantly occupied with yakuza wars, mahjong and assassinations… Until the day he stumbled upon a strange drug called Wild Adapter that produces bizarre side-effects–including death. Forever changed, Kubota becomes entangled with a drifter named Minoru Tokito, and the two form an unlikely companionship that draws them deeper into the mystery of Wild Adapter…

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

Yuhyeon becomes the youngest CEO of Hansung, a successful electronics company built on toxic work culture, but nobody he cares about is there to celebrate with him. After a night of drinking and wondering if he could change the past, he wakes up the next morning, 20 years younger at the beginning of his career.Armed with the experience and insights that made him CEO, Yuhyeon begins to revisit broken relationships and battle the enablers of Hansung’s cut-throat work environment. But he does not yet know how changing the past will affect his future...  (Source: Webtoons)

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=751168)

---
**Official Translations:** [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/drama/a-mans-man/list?title_no=2876), [Chinese (Simplified Characters) / 汉语](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/METROPOLIS/nanzihan/list?title_no=1548), [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/city-office/a-mans-man/list?title_no=3278),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/drama/the-man/list?title_no=2257), [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001100)
description.ru: Хан Ю Хён, лучший офисный работник на небесах и на земле. Потеряв все, он вернулся в прошлое и изменил свою жизнь!

description.en:
In the year 2020, humanity faces a crisis as Earth is attacked by unidentified monsters. Players prepare for the attack by challenging the Labyrinth that appeared. They can choose four options:

Easy Mode, where anyone can survive; Normal Mode, where you must work to survive; Hard Mode, where only 1% could survive; and Solo Mode, the harshest difficulty.

Kang TaeSan, the strongest Easy Mode player cleared the Labyrinth using an unconventional approach and acquired skills others could not: [ Addition, Multiplication, Attack Nullification, Ultimate Judgement...].

But because he chose Easy Mode, his power was lacking. Unable to prevent the extinction of humanity, he lay dying. A miraculous chance appears.

"This time I'll definitely become stronger."

Challenging the Labyrinth again, this is Skill-based Player Kang TaeSan's Solo Mode Attack Record!

If mercy and kindness can’t save the world, then this time, I choose to kill—

Eternal Slayer! Heavenly Lightning Slash! Sword of Annihilation! As long as you learn the most common sword skills, they can be upgraded to SSS rank?! Divine talent + forbidden skills! I’m the last spark of hope in this apocalypse!

altTitles.en: I Am Going to Be a Bastard
I Want to Be a Scoundrel
I'm Going to Be a Great Villain
I Want to Be a Big Baddie

description.en:
A proper villain must be ruthless and evil, a bringer of death! Having tormented the protagonist to his heart's content, he makes a brilliant exit. Once he's finished his work, he goes out with a bang.
Wang Yi was determined to be that kind of villain. Unfortunately… His male lead can read minds. (:з)∠*)
“You mongrel!” Mr. Yi chuckled as he looked down on the novel’s male lead.
Suddenly, a thought bubble filled with cute emojis (⁄ ⁄ ⁄ω⁄ ⁄ ⁄) and the words “You’re so cute…” appeared in front of Qin.
Qin: ?

altTitles.ja: THE GAMER

altTitles.th: เซียนเกม นอกจอ

description.en:
What if your life is just like playing a game? What if you can upgrade your status and gain more levels? A fantasy world is coming right at you!  
  
Han Jee-Han, a normal high school student, suddenly develops a special power where his entire world is shifted into a game-like setting. He can see the power levels of people, look at the stats of a seemingly normal item, get abilities, and even level up! Follow Han Jee-Han as he discovers how to use this power, and maybe even where it came from.
description.fr:
Et si votre vie ressemblait à un jeu vidéo et si vous pouviez améliorer vos stats et gagner plus de niveaux ?

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=152)

description.id:
Bagaimana kalau hidupmu seperti bermain game? Bagaimana kalau kamu bisa meningkatkan status dan levelmu dengan melakukan berbagai hal sehari-hari? Dunia penuh fantasi akan datang padamu!

description.ja:
ある日突然、現実がゲームの世界になったら⁉️

---

description.ko:
이유도 모른 채 현실이 게임처럼 뒤바뀐다면 어떻게 될까?
레벨이 오르고, 스테이터스를 올릴 수 있다면?
게임이 되어 버린 현실 속 모험기

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=152)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/the-gamer/list?title_no=232)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=495)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000901)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=1883)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=319)
description.ru:
Обычным дням школьной жизни пришёл конец с тех пор, как, из-за сильных пристрастий к MMORPG и другим компьютерным играм, обычный игроман и посредственный ученик Хан Чжи Хан был одарён «богиней Геей» сверхъестественным даром под ироничным названием «Игрок». Теперь он стал игровым персонажем в реальной жизни и может прокачивать уровень, тем самым повышая свои навыки так, как сам того желает. Только из-за этого «дара свыше» он оказался втянут в Бездну, мир полный сверхъестественных созданий и опасностей, которые будут преследовать его. По этой причине герой должен максимально быстро качать свой уровень и изучать новые способности, чтобы противостоять тем, кто попытается ему навредить, так как в Бездне это обычное явление. Но, к счастью, его лучший друг уже давно является частью Бездны и всеми силами помогает ему не умереть раньше времени. А вот что ждёт героя впереди, к чему приведёт его судьба и воля Геи, какова будет его роль в Бездне и чего он сможет добиться в познании своих сил, мы увидим в его дальнейших приключениях.

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=152)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/the-gamer/list?title_no=232)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=495)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=319)
description.th:
จะเป็นเช่นไรถ้าชีวิตคุณเหมือนกับการเล่นเกม? จะเป็นเช่นไรถ้าคุณสามารถเพิ่มค่าสเตตัสและอัพเลเวลได้? โลกแฟนตาซีเหนือจินตนาการกำลังพุ่งมาหาตรงหน้าคุณแล้ว!

---

description.zh:
当游戏的规则
套入玩家们的现实生活？

平凡的高中生韩志汉从某个瞬间开始像是在玩线上角色扮演游戏一样，可以看见人们头顶上标有的记号和等级，这到底是怎么一回事？

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=152)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/the-gamer/list?title_no=232)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=495)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000901)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=1883)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=319)
description.zh-hk:
平凡的高中生韓志漢從某個瞬間開始像是在玩線上角色扮演遊戲一樣看得見周圍每個人的頭頂上都標記著的特技和等級，甚至連幫忙跑腿的工作也變成像在遊戲中執行任務的模式，然後突然間他真的像從遊戲裡走出來的人一樣擁有了神奇的超能力并且能夠和其他玩家戰鬥，他的人生開始變成了一場遊戲。 日本的《刀劍神域》將原本電腦遊戲中的規則套入了玩家們的現實生活中，而《遊俠》這部作品則將主角原本平凡無奇的人生變得像遊戲一樣夢幻神奇，主角擁有了可以看到其他人的能力值和等級的能力後，他開始慢慢地開發自己的技能及等級，過程中也享受到彷彿在遊戲裡『練功』的樂趣。

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=152)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/the-gamer/list?title_no=232)

title.en: Only I Know That the World Will End

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Sekai ga Izure Horobu Koto wo, Ore dake ga Shitte Iru

altTitles.ja: この世界がいずれ滅ぶことを、俺だけが知っている　～モンスターが現れた世界で、死に戻りレベルアップ～

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Sekai ga Izure Horobu Koto o, Ore dake ga Shitteiru: Monster ga Arawareta Sekai de, Shi ni Modori Level Up

altTitles.en: Only I Know That the World Will End ~ In a World Where Monsters Appear, I Level Up by Returning From Death

altTitles.ja: この世界がいずれ滅ぶことを、俺だけが知っている

description.en:
Akira Ichijo is your average, run-of-the-mill businessman.

One day, on his way home from work, he is suddenly attacked by a Minotaur and killed on the spot. But in the blink of an eye... he wakes up back at the office!

When monsters invade into the real world, a cruel reality sets in as the world as we know it plummets into destruction and death. But with the unique skill [Resurrection], Akira can come back to life every time he dies, all the while inheriting the same levels and skills from his last run at life!

With unlimited chances to correct his past mistakes, it's up to Akira to utilize the skill he's given and survive this terrifying world with his childhood friend, Nao Nanase.

altTitles.ja-ro: Captain Tsubasa Memories ~Kore wa Nankatsu Shō vs Shūtetsu Shō Taikōsen Tōjitsu ni Okotta Hanashi~

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼 MEMORIES

altTitles.en: I'm Wakabayashi Genzo, birth of the SGGK
The legend of the strongest Meiwa FC

description.en: A collection of the "Captain Tsubasa Memories" one-shot series.

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam: The battle tales of Flanagan Boone

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム フラナガン・ブーン戦記

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gandamu Furanagan Boon Senki

description.en:
A new tragic tale from the "One Year War" unfolds. Flanagan Boone, a Zeon soldier, trained under his beloved Commander Garma Zabi, but then, the Gundam, the "White Devil of the Federation," appeared... A new One Year War begins from the perspective of Flanagan Boone, who appeared in the famous episode "Across the Atlantic Ocean
" (Episode 28) of the "Mobile Suit Gundam" anime!

altTitles.fr: La Grande Jahy ne Perd Jamais

altTitles.en: The Great Jahy Will Not Be Defeated!

altTitles.ja: ジャヒー様はくじけない！

description.en:
Jahy-sama (pronounced jah-hee) is an existence to be feared and respected throughout the Demon Realm. Well, was.

The (former) Demon Realm No. 2 is now busy with house chores and work…in the human realm! Her dinner is just beansprouts, and she can't afford anything except water at cafes, but she won't get discouraged!

---
**Note:**
Jahy's shirt says '魔界復興', which seems to translate to 'Demon Realm Restoration'.
description.ru: Джахи-сама - существо, которое боялись и уважали во всем демоническом мире. Ну, когда-то... Вторая по силе (прежде) мира демонов теперь занята домашними заботами и работой... в человеческом мире! Её ужин - одна фасоль, а в кафе она не может себе позволить ничего кроме воды, но её никогда не сломить!

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: レジェンド

description.en: Reiji Saeki was living in a north-eastern countryside town and lost his life in an accident during summer vacation. But before he knew it, a mysterious ball of light appeared in front of his eyes in a world of whiteness. Being a magician from a parallel world, that ball of light is looking for someone qualified to inherit the magic they had created in order to prevent it from being lost. Reiji, who took on that suggestion, lives in the parallel world Elgin, with a new body and powerful magic.

altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa: Road to 2002 - Go for 2006

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ROAD　TO　2002

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

title.en: The Strongest Chef in Another World

description.en: Kang Taeyang, a chef who chased his dreams. One day, he lost everything due to a single choice. But an opportunity came to Taeyang, who was spending hopeless days working odd jobs. [Aurora is hiring employees.] A single line of text changed everything for him!

altTitles.ja: STOP! 海賊版
海賊版、ダメ、絶対。～「STOP！ 海賊版」漫画描きおろし16作品集～

description.en:
In a world where manga can be enjoyed forever…
Manga culture has been able to blossom thanks to the power of manga lovers.
However, right now, manga is suffering because of piracy.
We need your help.

(Source: [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/blog/stop-piracy/))

---

**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Sukima](https://www.sukima.me/book/title/BT0000818522/)
- Alternative Official English - [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/blog/stop-piracy/) (Note: Last page of each chapter is missing)
description.es:
En un mundo donde el manga se puede disfrutar para siempre...
La cultura del manga ha podido florecer gracias al poder de los amantes del manga.
Sin embargo, ahora mismo, el manga está sufriendo a causa de la piratería.
Necesitamos tu ayuda.
description.ja:
いつまでも漫画を楽しめる世の中に 漫画を愛するみなさまの力で
漫画文化は花開きました。
しかし、今、漫画は海賊版に苦しんでいます。
みなさまの力が必要です。
まずは、下の「漫画」を読んでみてください。
漫画の未来を一緒に創りましょう！

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

title.en: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu

altTitles.ja: となりの猫と恋知らず

altTitles.en: The Feline Neighbor and the Unversed-in-Love

altTitles.ja: となねこ

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.

Han Tae-Sung, thought he was talented in video games and dreamt of turning his life around through BNW, but he would soon realize that life was not as easy as he thought it was.

He’s betrayed by his comrades, hunted down by his enemies, and even chased by debts in real life. He lost everything in the blink of an eye and was thrown down a pit of despair.

What stood in his way? Talent, wealth, connections, and luck.

There was simply no way he could win against those born differently no matter how much he struggled.

However, armed with a second chance and a hidden class, Tae-Sung starts from scratch and embarks on a journey to redeem himself and exact revenge against his enemies.

altTitles.ja: ケイヤクシマイ

description.en:
Kasane Hayafuji's secret joy in life is seeing Aoyama-san, a waitress at a family restaurant. One night, she saw Aoyama standing alone in the rain. When she tried to help, Aoyama suddenly made her an offer.

"Will you be my big sister?"

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59079)
description.id:
Menemui Aoyama-san yang bekerja sebagai pelayan di restoran keluarga merupakan arti kehidupan Hayafuji Kasane. Pada suatu hari, Kasane memutuskan membantu Aoyama-san yang tengah berdiam diri di tengah guyuran hujan. Kemudian, Aoyama-san tiba-tiba menawari Kasane perjanjian saudari.

“Bersediakah kamu… menjadi kakakku?”

title.en: Master of the Resurgence of Spiritual Energy

description.en: The resurgence of spiritual energy on Earth. Shen An receives a message from his future self and embarks on an invincible path! Shen An wants to keep a low profile, but the beautiful women around him won't allow it!

altTitles.ja: ちはやふるスピンオフのスピンオフ

description.en: A short-form comic from the author of Chihayafuru, showing Chihaya's college life.

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands (Official Colored)

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ カラー版

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure.

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.

"I’m... back!"

After a comet collides on Earth, a gaming world filled with monsters and dungeons becomes a reality. Amidst the chaos, Gong Won-Ho wakes up as Hardcore Leveling Warrior, an almighty game character with exceptional luck and power.

Once again, he will embark on a journey to become the strongest... but this time, on Earth!

title.en: One Step Closer to the Demon King

altTitles.ja: 魔王まであと一歩

altTitles.id: Aku Raja Lautan tapi jadi Gembel

altTitles.en: Even the Demon King, One Step at a Time
One Step to Being Dark Lord
One Step to the Demon King
One Step for the Dark Lord

description.en:
This is no different from ordinary villager life...
"There can be no one stronger than me in this world!"
To become the strongest, Yuria, the Sea Queen, went ashore in search of the Demon King. But when she looked at her reflection, she saw the face of a child. In exchange for her legs, she lost all her strength... Even so, still striving to become the strongest, Yuria begins a painful journey!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.id:
[ "Hanya saja... aku jadi tidak ada bedanya dengan penduduk desa..." ] "Tidak boleh ada makhluk yang lebih kuat dariku di dunia ini!" Untuk menjadi yang terkuat, Yuria, Raja Lautan, datang ke daratan untuk mencari Raja Iblis terkuat. Namun, saat melihat ke cermin, dia melihat wajah anak kecil...? Sebagai ganti kaki, dia telah kehilangan seluruh kekuatannya. Meskipun begitu, ia masih mengincar posisi teratas di dunia! Perjalanannya yang penuh air mata dimulai!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.ko:
["이건 그냥… 마을 사람 A랑 다를게 없잖아…"]

"나보다 강한 존재는 이 세계에 있을 수 없어!"
세계관 최강자 자리를 위해 지상최강 "마왕"을 찾아
뭍으로 나온 바다의 왕 "유리아" 

그런데… 거울을 보니 웬 어린아이가…?
다리를 얻음과 동시에 
그녀의 모든 힘이 사라져 버렸다...

그럼에도 여전히 세계최강 자리를 노리고 있는
 그녀의 눈물겨운 여정이 시작된다!!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.ru:
Это… Ничем не отличается от деревенской жизни... В этом мире не может быть существа сильнее меня!” Чтобы стать сильнейшей, Юрия, Морская Королева, вышла на сушу в поисках Короля Демонов. Но… Посмотрев на свое отражение, она увидела лицо ребенка... В обмен на ноги она потеряла все свои силы... Даже так, все еще стремясь стать сильнейшей, начинается мучительное путешествие Юрии!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.zh:
深海女王无奈变成小孩？
落魄海王的陆地称霸之旅！
大海之王友丽亚为了称霸天下，特地上岸来到陆地上寻找魔王一决胜负。可上岸后才发现，自己失去了所有的力量，而且还变成了小孩子？为了称霸天下，友丽亚辛酸的崭新旅程就此拉开帷幕！

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)

altTitles.ja: 押しかけ女房、コドモ付き!

description.en: High school girl Kousaka Kako's life is turned upside down when two uninvited guests show up on her doorstep; Mirai, a self-proclaimed girl from the future, and Nozomi, who is supposedly Mirai and Kako's child.

altTitles.ja: カップルゲーム

description.en: The "Couples Game" is played between a man and a woman who love each other. It is a competition in which couples compete to complete a set of instructions. The stage is an abandoned amusement park. The winning couple will receive a prize of 100 million yen and eternal love. The tragic game begins with the words, "Say you love me."
